title: Important Notice   My official Instagram account https instagram com assimalhakeem
transcript: This account is not mine. Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi. My name is Asim Al Hakim. As you know, I am quite visible on social media with the grace of Allah Azza Wa Jal and this is a test indeed. However, on Instagram there are two accounts. One that is mine which is Asim Al Hakim, one word. And this is the verified one that I own and my team runs it with my approval and nothing is posted on it without my permission. The other one which has approximately 1.7 million followers, I have nothing to do with it. I've tried many times to contact the person that owns it but without any success. So I have nothing to do with it. I'm not responsible of the material that is done with it or the activities that are associated with it. So this is a shout out to the one who's running it to get in touch with me so that we can have a collaboration. I don't want to close this account because Alhamdulillah Muslims are benefiting in a way from it. But when push comes to shove and there might be some questioning or danger on me personally, then maybe we would have to resort to such measures. So I would highly request that my followers, their followers, tag them along so and below or whatever they say so that they would be notified and I know they will be paying attention to what I say inshaAllah.
